revised_title: Radial Integrals for Nuclear Structure: Theoretical Studies and Applications
tldr: This article presents a theoretical study of radial integrals for nuclear s, p, and d shells, focusing on the interaction potential and particle radial wave-functions. The author evaluates integrals for the Gaussian and meson interactions, providing explicit expressions and numerical values for various integrals and ratios relevant to nuclear energy levels and spectroscopy.
